Key Match Events: Dallas Mavericks went on a game-saving 16-0 run to close out the contest, eventually surviving with a narrow 117-111 win.
Dereck Lively II finished with a 21-point, 16-rebound double-double, on 9-of-13 shooting from the field and 3-of-3 shooting from the charity stripe.
PJ Washington paced Dallas with 23 points on 5-of-13 shooting from the floor (2-of-5 from beyond the arc) and 11-of-11 shooting from the foul line, plus 14 rebounds, three steals, a block and a dime.
Post-Match Reflections: Chauncey Billups remarked postgame that he felt Camara was hit with a cheap shot and should have been awarded foul shots.
Billups noted that Camara's demonstrative reaction indicated there was something behind the incident.
